entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is present in the scene where students are interacting with hippogriffs.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is one of the hippogriffs being interacted with by Harry. It is described as gray and powerful.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who volunteers to interact with Buckbeak. He ignores warnings from his friends about tea leaves.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a student at Hogwarts who whispers a warning to Harry not to forget his tea leaves.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student at Hogwarts who whispers a warning to Harry not to forget his tea leaves.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is described as having malicious eyes.

relationships.description: Hagrid owns Buckbeak, as he is the one who unties its chains and lets it go.
Harry interacts with Buckbeak by climbing over the fence to get near it.
Lavender warns Harry not to forget his tea leaves before he interacts with Buckbeak.
Parvati also warns Harry not to forget his tea leaves before he interacts with Buckbeak.
Malfoy watches as Harry interacts with Buckbeak.
